summary: This document is a letter from two ICE HSI special agents offering assistance to an Epstein investigation task force. The agents note they read about Epstein arranging a marriage between a U.S. citizen and an Eastern European woman to keep her in the U.S., and they believe their expertise in marriage fraud investigations and access to DHS immigration databases could be valuable. They also mention their involvement in a marriage fraud investigation related to the NXIVM sex cult trial.

persons.name: Epstein
persons.context: The agents read that Epstein arranged a marriage between a U.S. citizen and an Eastern European woman to keep her in the U.S., indicating a foreign component to his trafficking enterprise.

events.title: NXIVM sex cult trial
events.description: A heavily-covered trial at the Eastern District of New York (EDNY) related to the NXIVM sex cult.

keyFacts: ICE HSI special agents read a news report stating Epstein arranged a marriage between a U.S. citizen and an Eastern European woman to keep her in the U.S.
The agents believe this indicates a foreign component to Epstein's trafficking enterprise where HSI can assist.
HSI has access to DHS databases including Alien Files, Immigrant/Non-Immigrant Visas, border crossings, and TECS for law enforcement purposes.
The agents are co-case agents on an ongoing marriage fraud investigation related to the NXIVM sex cult trial and have been on that prosecution team for over a year.
The agents offer their expertise in marriage fraud investigations to assist the Epstein task force with foreign-born subjects.
